text: I think Chapter 1 (+ maybe 2) of Jeynes' book <https://bayes.wustl.edu/etj/prob/book.pdf|Probability Theory: The Logic of Science> are a nice presentation of the idea of Bayesian data analysis as an extension of first order predicate logic. Suitable for undergrads, probably.
